rules.description: Change right_control + spacebar to control + backslash
Change right_command + W/A/S/D to Arrow Keys
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Keep cmd+enter for fullsceen in iterm2 && therm, and keep ctrl+tab for tab switch
Map cmd+enter to fullsceen besides iterm2 && therm
command + arrowkey for tab switch in terminal, disable command+D
Keep l_command and l_option in iterm2/therm/terminal/vimR/macvim with tab/space
Swap l_command  with l_option in iterm2/therm/terminal/vimR/macvim
Change button4,5 to back,forward like using command + []
Change button4,5 to button3 in some apps
